term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - energy hypersurface (synonymous with potential energy surface, PES)
term.title: energy hypersurface

item.text: The notion of hypersurface is used to stress the multidimensionality of PESs. In a molecular system consisting of N atomic nuclei, the number of the independent coordinates that fully determine the PES is equal to 3N - 6 (or 3N - 5 if the system is linear).

sources.item: PAC, 1999, 71, 1919. 'Glossary of terms used in theoretical organic chemistry' on page 1938 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199971101919)
